|  [resolveClient(emitterReference)](./nesbus.sbcontext.resolveclient.md) |  | Try to resolves a client (queue or topic emitter/sender) based on the entity name.<!-- -->If an entity reference is not provided, the default reference is the entity used to emit messages to this subscriber. If this is a queue subscriber, it will be a queue emitter. If this is a subscription, it will be the topic of the subscription.<!-- -->&gt; You can also provide a clientId to look the entity in. |
